data.system_settings: OnePlus 6 8RAM 256GB Internal storage Android 8.1 Oxygen OS 5.1.5
data.actual_result: Discord doesn't recognize microphone and I can't talk
data.expected_result: I'll be able to talk just fine
data.short_description: [OnePlus 6 ONLY] Discord doesn't recognize microphone (Can't talk in voice chats/calls)
data.steps_to_repro: - Grant Discord all the permissions it needs on your OnePlus 6 - go to a call/voice chat
